solution_list.title: Ekinops360 WDM
solution_list.description: Modular or stackable, active or passive, Ekinops WDM transport systems deliver the flexible capacity today’s networks need while providing a future proof platform to meet the next-generation of demand.

solution_list.title: Ekinops360 OTN
solution_list.description: The ETS platform improves the efficiency, flexibility and reliability of your transport network by virtualizing valuable optical resources allowing you to right-size capacity to meet demand.

solution_list.title: OneAccess Ethernet Access Devices
solution_list.description: OneAccess Ethernet Access Devices are carrier-grade, MEF-compliant access platforms. These flexible and future-proof platforms based make a comprehensive product range for Ethernet Access over Copper or Fiber.

solution_list.title: OneAccess Ethernet Access Devices
solution_list.description: OneAccess Ethernet Access Devices are carrier-grade, MEF-compliant access platforms. These flexible and future-proof platforms based make a comprehensive product range for Ethernet Access over Copper or Fiber.

solution_list.title: OneAccess Voice and Data Routers
solution_list.description: The ONE voice and data router series provides an unrivaled choice of routers to enable voice, data and services in Small Office & Branch office and for Mid to large enterprise.

solution_list.title: OneAccess uCPE
solution_list.description: (Universal Customer Premise Equipment) - The uCPE or whitebox is the hardware on which the virtualization solution is built. It provides the resources for computation, storage and networking. Ekinops adopts a completely open approach for the support of these x86 based platforms. Ekinops markets its own hardware series under the name OVP (Open Virtualization Platform), but is also reselling and servicing the Dell VEP series and is open to support (almost) any choice of third-party hardware.

solution_list.title: Compose ONEOS6
solution_list.description: Part of the Compose portfolio, Ekinops Logos OneOS6 2 is the modular software solution that enables a range of built-in services to be activated remotely and on-demand for the OneOS6 product range. It allows Service Providers to deliver innovative and high value business services to their customers.

solution_list.title: Compose Virtualisation
solution_list.description: Virtualization allows Service Providers and System Integrators to optimize at many levels: no need to deploy new hardware when introducing new network services, access to vendor-independency, customer responsiveness, and improved time-to-market for new services. Ekinops delivers a comprehensive and Open virtualization portfolio. All components from hardware, middleware, VNFs and management tools are highly portable and feature open APIs.

solution_list.title: Compose SD-WAN
solution_list.description: The Ekinops SD-WAN solution is an evolution rather than a revolution, Service providers can rapidly transform their traditional CPE router portfolio into a full-fledged SD-WAN solution and deliver unprecedented automation and visibility to their customers within a simple licence upgrade. By building on service providers’ strong core portfolio of services and customer relationships, SD-WAN can finally start to benefit the mass-market. Service providers and their customers can harness the power of a digital transformation solution that champions evolution over network disruption.

solution_list.title: Compose Edge Computing
solution_list.description: Enabling Service Providers to deliver the ‘Edge Computing’ value proposition to Enterprises Edge computing opens up new possibilities for many vertical use cases (e.g. Retail, Logistics, Manfacturing, etc.) and also represent a fantastic new monetization opportunity for Service Providers deploying Ekinops OneOS6. Enhanced by SixSq technologies, OneOS6 becomes a MEC (Multi Access Edge Computing) solution able to leverage the power of OneAccess routers in order to run any containerized applications on bare-metal. With the innovative Edge Computing Orchestration of SixSq, Service Providers can offer a real Market Place of downloadable applications directly on OneOS6 powered devices. Use cases are infinite!

solution_list.title: Compose Management Platforms
solution_list.description: Simplified deployements, network monitoring and diagnostics In converged, next generation networks and while migrating from static to dynamic services, the need of monitoring and automation is increasing. Whether in Optical transport, Routing and switching, NFV or Software Defined layers, management is an essential element of the delivered solutions.
